message:
Running command: python3 - << 'PY'
import sys
from pathlib import Path
p = Path('/workspace/matplotlib/lib')
print(p.exists())
print(list(p.iterdir())[:20])
print('sys.path before:', sys.path[:3])
sys.path.insert(0, str(p))
import importlib
m = importlib.import_module('matplotlib')
print('matplotlib.__file__', m.__file__)
print('matplotlib.__path__', getattr(m, '__path__', None))
print('pyplot location try:')
import matplotlib
try:
    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    print('got pyplot', plt)
except Exception as e:
    print('error importing pyplot:', repr(e))
PY

args.command:
python3 - << 'PY'
import sys
from pathlib import Path
p = Path('/workspace/matplotlib/lib')
print(p.exists())
print(list(p.iterdir())[:20])
print('sys.path before:', sys.path[:3])
sys.path.insert(0, str(p))
import importlib
m = importlib.import_module('matplotlib')
print('matplotlib.__file__', m.__file__)
print('matplotlib.__path__', getattr(m, '__path__', None))
print('pyplot location try:')
import matplotlib
try:
    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    print('got pyplot', plt)
except Exception as e:
    print('error importing pyplot:', repr(e))
PY
